lexUnit.name: itch.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: experience an unconfortable sensation that causes a desire to scratch the skin

sentence.text: His head was itching too much from the dreadful old grey wig .
Now he stood near the door with his hands clasping each other behind his back and his scalp itching furiously in the heat .

It was so hot that Perdita would have liked to have worn shorts or a dress , but her mosquito bites had come up in huge red bumps and were oozing and itching like mad , so she settled for her pale pink jeans and a dark blue shirt .
They lit smoky fires at night to keep them at bay , but were soon itching with bites .
Her fingers positively itched with the overwhelming desire to see his arrogant face transformed by a slap .
The flanks of his hands itched with imagined dirt .
Stephen felt his skin and nose begin to itch with the dust and seed that was blowing from the crops and hedgerows .
For this , he was completely undressed -- which makes his body itch to the point of agony -- and placed in a UV cabinet , his arms held above his head to stop him scratching .
Leith 's right hand started to itch again .
I 've had dandruff for some time and now my scalp has started to itch as well , but nothing seems to clear it up .
Her body itched constantly and salt crystals from the drying of perspiration clung to the hair of her armpits and rimed her skin .
Kate could feel it in her head , in her hair and eyes , under her eyelids , down her bra and in her pubic hair ; she itched everywhere .
It was as if his whole body was itching unbearably . "
The lids may be very sensitive and swollen ; the margins itch and burn .
Within hours , while he itched and writhed , the tissue was beginning to expand within him , hardening externally , invading his nervous system with internal tendrils .
For example , the worker may pause at one point and scratch his nose , this may indicate that a critical decision is being made or it may indicate simply that his nose was itching .
She had also noted patches of discoloured skin on the inner aspect of both ankles which itched .
The ears are thickened , they 're cracking , they 're bleeding , they itch and they hurt ; she almost scratched a hole on the outside of her ear because it hurt so much .
